dn1:1.11.2: pañcamaṃ → pañcamaṃ iti vā (bj, s1-3, mr)
dn1:1.13.2: meṇḍayuddhaṃ → meṇḍakayuddhaṃ (pts1), sobhanakaṃ → sobhanagarakaṃ (s1-3, km, pts1), mahiṃsayuddhaṃ → mahisayuddhaṃ (bj, s1-3, km, pts1), kumbhathūṇaṃ → kumbhathūnaṃ (bj, s1-3, mr), dhovanaṃ → dhopanaṃ (pts1)
dn1:1.15.2: hatthattharaṃ assattharaṃ rathattharaṃ → hatthat­thara­ṇaṃ assattharaṇaṃ rathattharaṇaṃ (pts1, mr)
dn1:1.16.2: daṇḍaṃ → daṇḍakaṃ (bj, pts1), nāḷikaṃ → nālikaṃ (s1-3), asiṃ → asiṃ khaggaṃ (s1-3, km) | khaggaṃ (pts1)
dn1:1.17.2: itthikathaṃ → itthīkathaṃ (bj) | itthikathaṃ purisakathaṃ (s1, km, mr) | itthīkathaṃ purisakathaṃ (s2, s3)
dn1:1.20.1: lābhena lābhaṃ nijigīsitāro ca → lābhena ca lābhaṃ nijigiṃsitāro (bj, s1-3, pts1)
dn1:1.24.2: sūriyaggāho → suriyaggāho (bj, s1-3, km, pts1), devadudrabhi → devadundubhi (bj, s1-3, km, pts1)
dn1:2.27.19: hoti ca na ca hoti → hoti ca na hoti ca (bj, pts1, mr)
